蠮字的基本解释

蠮
yē
〔蠮螉（
w卬g ）〕一种腰细长的蜂，俗称“细腰蜂”，身体黑色，翅带黄色，在地下做巢。

蠮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yē］
［《廣韻》烏結切，入屑，影。］
见“蠮螉”。

蠮字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠮； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1103第03
【唐韻】烏結切【集韻】一結切，?音噎。【類篇】蠮螉，蟲名，土蠭也。【爾雅·釋蟲】果蠃，蒲盧。【註】卽細?蜂也。俗呼爲蠮螉。又蠮螉，塞名。詳螉字註。　或作?、?。

蠮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蠮字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
yē
〔蠮艉(
w卬g)] a kind of bee with a long slender waist, commonly known as "slender-waisted bee", with a black body and yellow wings, making nests underground.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yē］
["Guangyun" black knot cut, cut into scraps, shadow. ]
See "蠮艉".
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠮; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1103 Page 03
[Tang Yun] Black knot cut [Ji Yun] One knot cut, sound choking. 【Classes】Cotworms, insect names, and earthworms. [Erya·Release insects] Fruit fly, Pu Lu. [Note] 卽 fine? Bee also. It is commonly called a scorpion. Also 蠮艉, stuffed name. Detailed note of the word.　Or as?,?.
